subject: Bail
lead_paragraph: The suspended Tennessee Titans cornerback Pacman Jones surrendered in Las Vegas and posted $20,000 bail on felony charges resulting from a strip club melee that preceded a triple shooting. Jones and two companions are accused of attacking and threatening employees inside the Minxx strip club during N.B.A. All-Star Weekend shortly before someone opened fire outside the club and wounded three people, including a bouncer who was paralyzed.
